articles.author: J. Kim Murphy
articles.title: Box Office: ‘Sonic the Hedgehog 3’ Stays Ahead of ‘Mufasa,’ Crosses $100 Million in North America - Variety
articles.description: 'Sonic the Hedgehog 3' leads domestic charts through the holidays as it notches $100 million. 'Mufasa: The Lion King' lags behind.
articles.content: The face-off between furry mammals rages on at the holiday box office, with Paramount’s “Sonic the Hedgehog 3” continuing to lead domestic charts. The video game inspired threequel earned another $12… [+2894 chars]
